document_data.mainbody:
Ghost Street was a small road located in the city of Zhentil Keep during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Ghost Street was located in northeast Zhentil Keep in the Common Quarter. Originating along Fortress Street, Ghost Street passed south for just  before ending at a gate leading into the Inner Quarter. Electrum Avenue connected with the southwest side of Ghost Street.
A warehouse used exclusively by the Zhentarim was located on Ghost Street.
